org.fxmisc.richtext.model

Class SimpleEditableStyledDocument<PS,S>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fxmisc.richtext.model.SimpleEditableStyledDocument<PS,S>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EditableStyledDocument<PS,StyledText<S>,S>, StyledDocument<PS,StyledText<S>,S>, TwoDimensional

    public final class SimpleEditableStyledDocument<PS,S>
extends Object
    Provides an implementation of EditableStyledDocument that is specified for StyledText as its segment. See also GenericEditableStyledDocument.
